previewArticle.title: New York Red Bulls vs. New England Revolution | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New York Red Bulls 1, New England Revolution 2 | MLS Cup Playoffs Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The New York Red Bulls and New England Revolution both return to the Conference Championships for the first time in years.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New York Red Bulls vs. New England Revolution

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Tannenwald
timelineItems.text: Live stream of #NYvNE here if you don't have rabbit ears attached to your TV. #MLSPlayoffs RT @JeffKassouf: http://t.co/FkeOXlCWzC #MLSonNBC

timelineItems.name: Ian Hest
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls fans began the game chanting "We Love Ya" for 6 min and 22 seconds straight. Or 7% of the entire game. #NYvNE

timelineItems.desc: Peguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) tries to receive a cross from Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls), but it goes out of bounds.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Peguy Luyindula tries to catch an Henry cross, but cannot get to it

timelineItems.name: James J Pepe
timelineItems.text: This ref has talked to every #RBNY player that has commited a fould. A bit over the top this guy. In line to ruin the match. #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 10: Another save for Robles off a cross from the right. 0-0 #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Peter Nolan
timelineItems.text: No one does the look of disdain like Thierry Henry. Charlie Davies just earned one for going down too easily #MLSplayoffs #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Ryan Lanigan
timelineItems.text: Luyindula goes down pretty easy in the box but is quickly up and fine to chase down the ref shouting for a PK. #NERevs #MLS #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Shoulder to shoulder. I like it Jose. Get up Peguy! #NYvNE #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: MLS GB
timelineItems.text: Luyindula looking for a penalty after he was shoved over in the box. Referee not interested. #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: No le cabe ni un alma al Red Bull Arena. 25,000 personas presentes: http://t.co/rXVUrtCzrn #NYvNE (via @billykeenly) http://t.co/b01fKIF5kO

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: That challenge by Gonclaves on Luyindula was shoulder-to-shoulder, but that's some risky move with your man moving AWAY from goal. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Greg Eaton
timelineItems.text: Nervous about how wide open this game has been early. #NERevs #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.desc:
The New York Red Bulls and New England Revolution talk about improving on past failures ahead of their Eastern Conference Championship. 

Leg 1: Sunday, November 23rd 1:30pm ET on NBC. 

WATCH: Red Bulls and Revs on preparing for Thierry Henry and Jermaine Jones
http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/19/thierry-henry-and-bradley-wright-phillips-vs-jermaine-jones-and-lee-nguyen-2014-mls

WATCH: Davies and Revs want to "shock" Red Bulls 
http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/18/revs-and-red-bulls-sound-eastern-conference-championship-2014-mls-cup-playoffshttp://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/18/revs-and-red-bulls-sound-eastern-conference-championship-2014-mls-cup-playoffs

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: Red Bulls and Revolution look to improve on past playoff performance | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Nguyen doing an excellent job in early stages of picking up good spaces defensively and stopping simple distribution out of the back. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: If you're playing at home, angry Mike Petke just yelled at the refs. Drink. #RBNY #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: MLSApologist
timelineItems.text: You don't want to make Henry angry. You won't like him when he's angry #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Ambroise Oyongo Bitolo (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Queen City Gooners
timelineItems.text: Horrible no call in the box #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: For me on first glance, I'd say it was a hard but good challenge from Goncalves. Shoulder-to-shoulder. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 14: Lloyd takes a shot, but it's caught by Shuttlesworth. 0-0 #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Steve Davis
timelineItems.text: #NYvNE in a nutshell so far: Red Bulls not great. Frustrated RBNY fouling. Then RBNY screaming at ref ... for calling fouls! #NotHisFault

timelineItems.name: Ben Cordes
timelineItems.text: Neat side story here: Heaps vs Petke on the bench. Two MLS veterans now managing teams. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 15: Alexander to Henry looking for BWP front and center. 0-0 #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: MLS GB
timelineItems.text: Lloyd Sam again looking a threat down the right. He's so effective at Red Bull Arena. #NYvNE

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 0, New England Revolution 1. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) left footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Teal Bunbury dances past defender and curls home from distance

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Incredible shot. No chance of saving that. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: MLSApologist
timelineItems.text: Wow #nyvne

timelineItems.name: Kyle J. Silva
timelineItems.text: Bunbury!!! My goodness what a beauty of a goal. #STAND #NERevs 1-0

timelineItems.name: Andrew Davis
timelineItems.text: WHAT AN AMAZING CURLING ARROW OF A SHOT. Bunbury opens it up #NERevs 1-0 #NYRB #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Jason Christley
timelineItems.text: Wow. What. A. Strike. #NERevs #STAND

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Olé! @TealBunB, folks. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 17' GOAL. Teal Bunbury with the the step over, cut inside and hit a beautiful curving shot at the far post with his left. #NERevs #MLS #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: That was a world-class goal from Bunbury. Who would have thought he'd emerge as a top-notch winger this year? #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Jámison Olave (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Charlie Davies (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Not blue! Not green! He's something in between! He's Teal! It's @TealBunB's second of the playoffs. #NERevs lead 1-0 in the 19th minute.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 1' The #NERevs and #RBNY underway in the first leg of the MLS Eastern Conference Finals. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Jonathan Tannenwald
timelineItems.text: A panorama of Red Bull Arena during the national anthem. #NYvNE #MLSPlayoffs @NewYorkRedBulls @NERevolution #MLS http://t.co/5nRk6C2lEx

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Ambroise Oyongo Bitolo (New York Red Bulls) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: SirSeaBiscuit
timelineItems.text: 1. Why does Eckersley exist 2. No shape at all 3. No force in the midfield or attack 4. Why does NE have a better DM than Arsenal. #NYRB

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New York Red Bulls 1, New England Revolution 2.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Goncalves is pleased with that result. #STAND #NYvNE http://t.co/QvHi3DS81r

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: .@NERevolution cobró la ineficacia de los Red Bulls y viajan tranquilos a la vuelta: http://t.co/lwXdqJ0VHR #NYvNE http://t.co/WSuq6aF1bX

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Headed home happy. #STAND #NYvNE http://t.co/GkyKUXIJ0Z

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Here's the sequence that led to @Jermainejunior's game-winner: http://t.co/Pa1jTOUuK6 #STAND #NYvNE http://t.co/aiChWW9Tk2

timelineItems.desc: The New York Red Bulls and New England Revolution both return to the Conference Championships for the first time in years.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New York Red Bulls vs. New England Revolution | November 23, 2014

timelineItems.desc:
MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham and Andrew Wiebe recap the first leg of the Eastern Conference Championship between the New York Red Bulls and the New England Revolution.

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: New York Red Bulls vs. NE Revolution Eastern Conference Championship Leg 1 Recap | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Advantage, @NERevolution. HIGHLIGHTS: http://t.co/WF7sR1cOhU #NYvNE http://t.co/8cCG4ZRbNm

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Henry and Jones getting into some tough one-on-one battles. Henry getting real physical to ward off Jones' challenges. #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Un maravilloso zurdazo de Teal Bunbury pone a @NERevolution arriba: http://t.co/3bPX3u1rih #NYvNE http://t.co/7H5aJzveDe

timelineItems.name: Craig Silva
timelineItems.text: Sorry NY but the ref isn't going to win the game for you. Quit crying and play the game. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones’ kick to return the ball after a drop ball required a save. Just saying. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: A.J. Soares (New England Revolution) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: A.J. Soares goes into the book

timelineItems.name: Ryan Wallerson
timelineItems.text: Goal by Bunbury to open the scoring for #dcunited. Familiar feeling for #nyrb, but Robles couldn't do anything about that one. #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Rough challenges early, including but not limited to Olave-Davies. This is playoff MLS. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Bunbury scored New England's 10th away goal from outside the box this season, no other team did better (with @EyeOTGame). #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by A.J. Soares (New England Revolution).
Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 23' #NERevs 1 #RBNY 0 Yellow issued to @AjSoares. http://t.co/wpc7Q85P8b

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Soares called for foul on BWP. Cameras likely didn't catch it but Henry brought ensuing aerial ball down w a good 1st touch .. w/ his butt.

timelineItems.name: Loyals SC
timelineItems.text: That Bunbury goal- #NYvNE http://t.co/XTA26Ye29o

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Cahill said a #NERevs high press on the road is a risk. Right now, seems more reward. #RBNY #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution).
Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.desc: Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Jermaine Jones booked for taking down Dax McCarty

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Thierry Henry.
Foul by Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution).
Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 25: Dax McCarty denied a shot from distance. 0-1 #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 25' #NERevs 1 #RBNY 0 Two big-time blocks from @Oneswitz, who stepped into the path of shots from Dax McCarty and Eric Alexander.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New York Red Bulls 1, New England Revolution 1. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) header from very close range to the bottom left corner of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Bradley Wright-Phillips heads it home during intense play

timelineItems.name: Andrew Davis
timelineItems.text: Great "drop toe hold" by Jermaine Jones. Sign him up for @WWE #NERevs #MLSPlayoffs #NYRB

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Ambroise Oyongo Bitolo with a through ball.
Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) hits the bar with a right footed shot from the centre of the box.

timelineItems.name: Tim Froh
timelineItems.text: That was an AMAZING save by Luyindula. Incredible effort. #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution).
Richard Eckersley (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Luyindula's first effort saved by Shuttleworth. Luyindula then volleys off the bar FROM THE GROUND, and BWP finishes the rebound. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Johnny Vilchez
timelineItems.text: GOOOOOOOOOOOOOL!!!!!!!!!!! BRADLEY WRIGHT-PHILLIPS!!!!! 31st GOAL!!!!!! TIED 1-1!!! #DARE2BWP #NYvNE #MLSPlayoffs #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Otto Mejia
timelineItems.text: WHAT. A. GAME. #NYvNE

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) header from the center of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Luis Robles leaps for a close Jermaine Jones header

timelineItems.comment: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Richard Eckersley (New York Red Bulls).
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Jámison Olave.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: We're underway on NBC: http://t.co/Yl0qJtabXB #NYvNE Here's the South Ward tifo (via @jrojasa75). http://t.co/DEqF9IATgF

timelineItems.name: rth
timelineItems.text: Feel kind of sorry for all those MLS haters missing this one. #NYvNE

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Lloyd Sam bends it wide

timelineItems.name: Jeff Zeserson
timelineItems.text: Now THIS is a playoff game. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Fred Hurley
timelineItems.text: Not to borrow too heavily from Ferrari's relationship with Italian race fans, but NEW ENGLAND EXPECTS, FELLAS! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: WATCH: @TealBunB opened the scoring for @NERevolution with this gem: http://t.co/tJkfVNUL4p #STAND #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Thierry Henry.

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: BWP Offside? #NYvNE #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/EOCBQADr2r

timelineItems.desc: FIFA 15 picks the winner of leg 1 of the Eastern Conference Championship between the New York Red Bulls and New England Revolution at Red Bull Arena.
timelineItems.title: Eastern Conference Championship FIFA 15 Simulation | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs

timelineItems.comment: Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Matt Lampson
timelineItems.text: Looked like BWP was offside on that equalizer. Must have 2 defenders behind the ball (usually the GK). Very close. #NYvNE @MLS #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: M. Willis
timelineItems.text: Outstanding New England doubleheader happening right now. If you’re watching the #Pats, flip over to NBC and give the #NErevs 15 minutes.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New England Revolution. Lee Nguyen tries a through ball, but Charlie Davies is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Crew 96
timelineItems.text: All I want is for Jermaine Jones to score a deliberate hand-ball own goal, putting #NERevs down and ejecting him. That's all I'm asking.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Davis
timelineItems.text: Very physical game all the way around. I was a little late on the "5 to 10 minutes" for the first yellow... #NERevs #MLSPlayoffs #NYRB

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Con el empate, @TheRealBWP llegó a 31 anotaciones en este 2014. ¡Hodgson, te hablan!: http://t.co/t6q4WZayKG #NYvNE http://t.co/XGfg85CKaC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by A.J. Soares (New England Revolution).
Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Taylor Twellman
timelineItems.text: BWP was offside but my point on Goncalves was ball in behind he keeps Luyindula onside #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: It's been a while since uninterrupted soccer has been played #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Thierry Henry called for sliding into Scott Caldwell

timelineItems.name: Miles Halpine
timelineItems.text: Great save by Shuttleworth. #MLSPlayoffs #NERevs #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 34: Henry takes a FK, and it's neatly caught by Shuttlesworth. 1-1 #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 37' Yellow to New York's Thierry Henry. He was late to a tackle and got all of Caldwell, no ball. #MLS #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: James H
timelineItems.text: Heeeeeeeere's Mikey! #NYvNE #MLS http://t.co/1zqRXjhje9

timelineItems.desc:
Revs & Red Bulls players talk about how they prepare for each others big weapons.

Part 1: http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/18/revs-and-red-bulls-sound-eastern-conference-championship-2014-mls-cup-playoffs
timelineItems.title: Thierry Henry and Bradley Wright-Phillips vs Jermaine Jones and Lee Nguyen | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.name: Massive Scoop
timelineItems.text: If Henry gets a yellow, then how does Jones not get a red? #mls #MLSPlayoffs #NYvNE

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth pounces on a close-range strike from Lloyd Sam

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Chris Tierney.
Attempt saved. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Eric Alexander.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Lloyd Sam terrorizing the right wing as usual. Shuttleworth has to stop him again. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: B Larsen | Arsenal
timelineItems.text: I like Caldwell; feel he's one of the most underrated players in MLS. However, wish he distributed more instead of just clearing it. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: "Hack a Shaq" in full effect as #RBNY target Jermaine Jones and #NERevs hitting Luyindula. Hard. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: As fun as it was earlier on, this match is getting a bit out of hand. Referee wisely dishing out a few cards to cool things off. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Jay and Petke jawing at either other with smirks on both faces. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 39: Lloyd Sam sends a good ball in, but it's denied by Shuttlesworth. 1-1 #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 40' #NERevs 1 #RBNY 1 Simple save for @b_shuttle, who gets low to gobble up a tight-angle shot. Approaching halftime at Red Bull Arena.

timelineItems.name: Abner H. Aceves
timelineItems.text: JJ should have been shown red by now. 24th Min. tackle from behind should have been a yellow. 2 minutes later yellow for same tackle. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: NESN Soccer
timelineItems.text: Petke, Heaps jawing on the sidelines. Referee has a word with both coaches. #NYvNE #NERevs #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @TheRealBWP cleans up a Luyindula attempt to level the match: http://t.co/wBBX6ReEt9 #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Petke getting a talking to from the refs. Heaps follows. Both have been jawing at officials -- and each other. #RBNY #NERevs #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Tyler Chavez
timelineItems.text: Something's wrong with Jones. He's making bad passes and he may be hurting right now. #NYvNE

timelineItems.desc: Foul by Ibrahim Sekagya (New York Red Bulls).
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Ibrahim Sekagya called for persistent infringement

timelineItems.name: MLSApologist
timelineItems.text: Petke + Heaps = BFFs. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 42' Luyindola springs BWP in but Farrell chases him down, gets in front and earns the goal kick. #NERevs #MLS #RBNY

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: 42' #NERevs 1 #RBNY 1 Fantastic tracking run from @2Fast2Farrell to take the ball off Wright-Phillips, who was momentarily through on goal.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: As Petke said, Luyindula is "great with the ball at his feet." Jukes Nguyen and splits #NERevs defense over the top. #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ibrahim Sekagya (New York Red Bulls).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Allen Chapman gives Sekagya a yellow for persistent infringement. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 43: Sekagya is shown a yellow card. 1-1 #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Bryan with a y
timelineItems.text: #NYvNE http://t.co/FEmgFGufAJ

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Sekagya preventing a sure-fire counter with a rough challenge from behind. Smart move, but gets hit with a yellow. #NYvNE #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: MLS GB
timelineItems.text: Oyongo started shakey but he's looking a real threat down the left. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Biggest takeaway so far when comparing #NERevs, #RBNY attack: NY play as a team, Revs looking for individuals to break through. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: MLSApologist
timelineItems.text: I won't be happy til both goalkeepers get yellows. #NYvNE

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) header from very close range is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Bradley Wright-Phillips heads it just over the bar from close range

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Going to be very interested to see the halftime stats, because Matchcenter says Sekagya has one foul. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: BWP PUTS A HEADER OVER THE BAR. Have to hit that. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 45: Henry to BWP for a header that goes just over the crossbar. 1-1 #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) header from very close range is just a bit too high. Assisted by Thierry Henry with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Joe Slaven
timelineItems.text: And Jermaine Jones stands up, screams at crowd "ARE YOU NOT ENTERTAINED?" #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Upper 90 Soccer
timelineItems.text: HT: BWP's header has #RBNY level at the half. Decent response from the hosts after the Revs' hot start and Bunbury's screamer. 1-1 #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, New York Red Bulls 1, New England Revolution 1.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: HT #NERevs 1 #RBNY 1 @TealBunB's stunning opener answered by Bradley Wright-Phillips and we're level at halftime of this first leg.

timelineItems.name: NE Soccer Journal
timelineItems.text: Scintillating first half of soccer. Bunbury and Wright-Phillips trade goals. 4 yellow cards and nonstop action at RBA. #RBNY 1-1 #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Si así fueron los primeros 45 minutos, la segunda mitad será impresionante: http://t.co/wG4sKMbx1A #NYvNE http://t.co/fqTAAR6Xi0

timelineItems.name: amarl
timelineItems.text: Can almost see the steam blowing out his ears. #NYvNE http://t.co/G9rsFqJN0g

timelineItems.name: Ben Baer
timelineItems.text: Jermaine Jones completed 17 of his 24 passes in the first half. The 70.8% would be his second lowest in a game with the Revolution. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: This #PetkeFace is superb. #NYvNE http://t.co/sfyfxE0P95

timelineItems.name: Justin Copenhaver
timelineItems.text: The broadcast of the #NERevs game is of unacceptable quality. #NBC #Directv #MLSPlayoffs #MLSonNBC #MLS

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: HIGHLIGHT: In the 27th minute, @TheRealBWP levels the score. http://t.co/f7BkgoHNEw 1-1 #NYvNE #dare2BWP

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: BWP missed a dead on chance. In other news the sun rose and the birds are singing #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: American Fútbol
timelineItems.text: Now would be a good time for Jay Heaps to rip off his shirt, sprout metal claws and prove he's the Wolverine I've known he is. #Revs #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown
timelineItems.text: If we can get another goal then we're good. That half was frustrating because we're not used to seeing that performance from #NERevs lately

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Knives out for the Revs in the first 10 minutes of half 2. We'll see if RBNY can coax them into overcommitments & hit them long. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Tyler Schochenmaier
timelineItems.text: Right now #BWP scores on 48% of shots on goal and 26% of all shots. #lethal #MVP #NERevs #MLSPlayoffs #NYRB #mls #MLSCup @TheRealBWP

timelineItems.name: Eric Lander
timelineItems.text: Can't help but believe the second half of this game means far more to the hopes of the #NERevs than #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Important RT @GrantWahl Yellow cards wiped clean after 1st legs, which means no players would be suspended for MLS Cup final on accumulation

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 46' Second half underway. New England and New York are tied 1-1. #NERevs #MLS #RBNY

timelineItems.desc:
MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham, Andrew Wiebe and former USMNT assistant coach Jesse Marsch break down the game changers for the New England Revolution ahead of their Eastern Conference Championship class vs. New England Revolution.

WATCH PART 1 HERE: http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/13/ny-red-bulls-vs-ne-revolution-preview-part-1-history-mls-cup-playoffs-presented-att

Part III: Q&A Preview, will feature answers to fan questions and a detailed preview of the series. 

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: NY Red Bulls vs. NE Revolution, Part 2: Game Changers for New England | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins New York Red Bulls 1, New England Revolution 1.
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by A.J. Soares.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: Second half underway with the #NERevs and #RBNY level at 1-1. Still 45 minutes to play in the first leg of the Eastern Conf. Championship.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jámison Olave (New York Red Bulls).
Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: We've got 45 minutes left. Flip on NBC right now. It's going to be electric: http://t.co/HTcYmHi0Uj #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Luis Robles tries a through ball, but Lloyd Sam is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Johnny Vilchez
timelineItems.text: NICE SAVE!!!! LUIS ROBLES!!!!! #NYvNE #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Ben Cordes
timelineItems.text: Warning: my Twitter feed may become all-sportsball for the next 2-3 hours. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: And there's the first (of likely many) big save of the series from Robles, as he goes full stretch to deny a Jones header. #RBNY #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Lloyd Sam tries a through ball, but Bradley Wright-Phillips is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: #RBNY been killing #NERevs with passes over the top, splitting CBs. Revs starting to realize they can do same w vets Olave, Sekagya #NYvNE

timelineItems.desc:
MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham, Andrew Wiebe and former USMNT assistant coach Jesse Marsch break down the game changers for the New York Red Bulls ahead of their Eastern Conference Championship class vs. New England Revolution.

WATCH PART 1 HERE: http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/13/ny-red-bulls-vs-ne-revolution-preview-part-1-history-mls-cup-playoffs-presented-att

Part III: Q&A Preview, will feature answers to fan questions and a detailed preview of the series. 

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: NY Red Bulls vs. NE Revolution, Part 2: Game Changers for New York | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Lloyd Sam sends it over the bar after a Thierry Henry rebound

timelineItems.name: Dom
timelineItems.text: All these yellow cards are going to turn this into a draw unless someone gets a red. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: juan carlos jimenéz
timelineItems.text: #NERevs #NERrvestrip #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Eric Alexander.
Attempt missed. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Jones is off today. Perhaps early challenges have slowed him down. Noticable. #NYvNE #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Richard Eckersley (New York Red Bulls) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Richard Eckersley booked for taking down Kelyn Rowe

timelineItems.name: Johnny Garay
timelineItems.text: WOW!!! What a wasted chance by Sam off the rebound from Henry's shot. SMH. #NYvNE #MLS #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Steve Holroyd
timelineItems.text: Thierry Henry playing a lot like a man trying to avoid turf next week #NYvNE #MLSonNBC

timelineItems.name: New York Red Bulls
timelineItems.text: 52: Lloyd Sam tries to tap in the rebound off Henry's saved shot, but it falls just wide of the net. 1-1 #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Eric Converse
timelineItems.text: What is going on with all the rebounds today Shuttleworth? Not just the last shot. I disagree with the announcer. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution) header from the right side of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Chris Tierney with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Drew Zuhosky
timelineItems.text: #NYRB probably should have had another goal there. #NERevs thanking their lucky stars that match is still level. #MLSplayoffs #MLSCup

timelineItems.name: Richard Fleming
timelineItems.text: Sam ... you've got Henry to answer to. #NYvNE http://t.co/rssNeLao1a

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martinez
timelineItems.text: Still chippy. This game has erased any argument of BWP being MVP. He's Chad Barrett w/ more chances and 27 goals. #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Foul by A.J. Soares (New England Revolution).
Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Ibrahim Sekagya (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Amanda Cabral
timelineItems.text: This is not soccer. This is a wrestling match #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Bobby Shuttleworth skillfully handles a powerful rip from Bradley Wright-Phillips

timelineItems.name: BOG
timelineItems.text: Eckersley plays better as the name of a baseball pitcher. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Roderick MacNeil
timelineItems.text: Eckersley needed a yellow about 40 mins ago. Between him and Jermaine Jones, both teams fortunate to still have 11 on field. #NYvNE #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Lee Nguyen.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martinez
timelineItems.text: This game has erased any BWP for MVP argument. He's basically been Chad Barrett but with 27 more chances. #NYvNE #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Bradley Wright-Phillips (New York Red Bulls) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Lloyd Sam.

timelineItems.text: This ref just loves yellow cards...smh #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Chandrima Chatterjee
timelineItems.text: Heading to StubHub now. 7 yellow cards! Wha?! Sorry, distracted by that #NYvNE stat. Follow me on @wunitedfc for #LAvSEA :) #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Says a lot about Jones' proclivity for theatrics that the whole RBA pressbox assumes he was faking. Definitely not, tho. Ugly gash. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Bradley Meek
timelineItems.text: I thought #NYvNE was in Red Bull stadium, not the Thunderdome

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Revs look to be packing it in for the final twenty minutes, hoping to hit on the counter. NY need a goal. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: James McPherson
timelineItems.text: Watching Charlie Davies run now makes me sad to remember his pace pre-injury. I keep waiting for him to explode down the side. #NYvNE

timelineItems.text: Cahill to start on Saturday unless he comes in & gets sent off after 5 minutes. #RBNY #NYvNE

timelineItems.text: Early chance for Junior. Revs looking for the away goal early and often. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: First great attack from NY - BWP heads to Sam who breaks through, shot saved by Shuttleworth. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Ryan Walters
timelineItems.text: At long last after the eternal international break, #MLSPlayoffs are back in my life. Today is a good day. #NYRB v #NERevs saving my Sunday.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Cahill earns a yellow, Jones misses an open look. So many blown chances for both teams. Who will rue them most when this series ends? #NYvNE

timelineItems.text: #LuisRobles already with a big save early on. #RedBulls are gonna need a couple to win today. #MLSONNBC #NYvNE #MLSPlayoffs #RunWithUs #RBNY

timelineItems.desc:
MLSsoccer.com's Jason Saghini, Andrew Wiebe and former USMNT assistant coach Jesse Marsch answer all your questions and tweets ahead of the Eastern Conference Championship clash between the New York Red Bulls and the New England Revolution.

WATCH PART 1 HERE: http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/13/la-galaxy-vs-seattle-sounders-preview-part-i-history-mls-cup-playoffs-presented-att

WATCH PART 2 HERE: NY Red Bulls Game Changers -  http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/17/ny-red-bulls-vs-ne-revolution-part-2-game-changers-new-york-mls-cup-playoffs-presen

NE Revolution Game Changers: http://www.mlssoccer.com/video/2014/11/17/ny-red-bulls-vs-ne-revolution-part-2-game-changers-new-england-mls-cup-playoffs-pre
timelineItems.title: NY Red Bulls vs. NE Revolution, Part 3: Breaking down all your tweets and questions | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Fireworks, full house, fans with scarves held high, Metrostars, Red Bulls ... this is what a big game atmosphere is all about #RBNY #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Jennifer Gasbarro
timelineItems.text: Amazing FORT support at the #NERevs game! #STAND

timelineItems.name: Adam Masin
timelineItems.text: Best TIFO ever. #nyrb http://t.co/pT1ulyF9Qf

timelineItems.name: MLS GB
timelineItems.text: Great atmosphere at Red Bull Arena. Two great attacking sides. Expecting a memorable game in this one. #NYvNE #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.text: Not sure why anyone is logically pissed at the ref for all of these cards. Can you show me ONE of them that wasn't deserved? #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: GOAL! What a pass from @TealBunB. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martinez
timelineItems.text: The Cahill for Alexander sub no looks, as Sir Charles would say, turble! #NYvNE #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Dan Mayer
timelineItems.text: Jones makes it 2-1 in final minutes of the game! The only World Cup starter not experiencing a hang over? #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: JT Chang
timelineItems.text: This game alone justifies the trade for Bunbury. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Matthew Levine
timelineItems.text: Jones scored to give #NERevs a second away goal and the lead heading back to New England. Still not convinced that wasn't offside. #NYvNE

Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Thierry Henry (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martinez
timelineItems.text: Both keepers called to action early. Good signs of a cracker of a game. #NYvNE #MLSPlayoffs #MLS

timelineItems.name: MLS GB
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls now attack through Sam but his shot is saved and then Shuttleworth denies BWP minutes later. #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Daren Graves
timelineItems.text: What a team effort by the #NERevs! Great touch by Tierney. Great pass from Nguyen. What a run by Bunbury to set up the assist to Jones!

timelineItems.text: That Bradley Wright-Phillips yellow card/suspension looking more costly by the minute...#NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Lyndsey Jones
timelineItems.text: Stoppage time is so stressful in soccer especially when it goes over whats stated #MLS #FutbolSunday #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: B Larsen | Arsenal
timelineItems.text: .@TealBunB has been superb tonight. One of his best matches in a @NERevolution shirt. Tremendous these #MLSPlayoffs. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Justin Copenhaver
timelineItems.text: Hearing the @MidnightRiders and the @NErebellion all the way from New Hampshire. Way to represent guys. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Andy Dorman subs in for Lee Nguyen. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Massive Scoop
timelineItems.text: Stoppage time = time Jones spent sunbathing #mls #MLSPlayoffs #NYvNE

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Andrew Farrell.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls) header from the center of the box misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Tim Cahill tries to equalize in the last minute of the game, but heads it wide

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Bobby Shuttleworth.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Nguyen with a MONSTER game. Was quiet due to physical play early on, but clogged up loads of passes and decisive on goals. #NERevs #NYvNE

timelineItems.name: Rosa DaCosta Duarte
timelineItems.text: How will I ever get through £next Sat at Gillette I am having chest pains today #NERevs longest 4+ minutes ever

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: FT whistle blows. 2-1 win for the Revs and there are 1,150 happy fans in the upper deck. #RBNY #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Tim Cahill (New York Red Bulls) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Dax McCarty with a cross following a corner.
Second Half ends, New York Red Bulls 1, New England Revolution 2.
